queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{prism}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{prism-init-post}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ui-service-test}}.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

queries.query_name: Cluster Admin Rolebinding With Superuser Permissions
queries.description: Ensure that the cluster-admin role is only used where required (RBAC)

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ibm-app-nav' of kind 'ClusterRoleBinding' isn't binding 'cluster-admin' role with superuser permissions
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ibm-app-nav' of kind 'ClusterRoleBinding' is binding 'cluster-admin' role with superuser permissions

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ui-service-test}}.spec.containers.name={{main}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{prism-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{app-nav-api}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{prism}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{app-nav-ui}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{prism-init-post}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{prism-init}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{prism-init-post}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{prism-init}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ui-service-test}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{main}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ui-service-test}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{main}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{prism}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{app-nav-api}}

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-app-nav-ui-ingress}}.apiVersion of Ingress  is deprecated and is {{extensions/v1beta1}}
